===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# root of the [[w:Scutellaria baicalensis|Chinese Skullcap]] (An [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to treat hypertension, to reduce "fire" and "dampness", and to treat prostate and breast cancers.)
